sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-port', templateUrl: './port.component.html', styleUrls: ['./port.component.css'] }) export class PortComponent { showImg :boolean = false; source : string = ''; src2 = "assets/images/port2.png"; log(event:string){ this.source =event; this.showImg = true; } hideImg(event:Event){ event.target === document.getElementById('model') ? null :this.showImg = false; } }

PORTFOLIO COMPONENT
